verbose_text: In DRG neurons treated with TNF-alpha (40 ng/ml for 25 h), inhibiting TNFR1 by SPD304 or inhibiting p38 MAPK by PD169316 completely abolished TNF-alpha-induced expression of nNOS, while inhibition of phosphatidylinositol-3 kinase, protein kinase C, and mitogen activated protein kinase showed no significant effect (XREF_FIG).
